'''Furina''' is a [[Character Card]] obtained in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. Furina starts the battle as an [[Arkhe: Ousia Cards|Ousia]] card, but is able to switch to become a [[Arkhe: Pneuma Cards|Pneuma]] card and vice versa by using [[Seats Sacred and Secular]].
